thread.section_title: Lyft Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lyft | www.lyft.com | 2 of 104
thread.title: Chad Frenzel

author: Chad Frenzel
title: Chad Frenzel
text:
I think there are way too many cancelations allowed especially in a town like Las Vegas were you can get a ride request on other side of the street in the opposite direction and ride cancels on you all the time even when you already make the uturn and turn around. What is being done to minimize or limit the amount of cancelations cause the 5 minute mark is not fair for drivers. I can drive over 7 miles in 5 minutes just to have someone cancel the ride just before the 5 minute mark and we get nothing but lost gas
Also line rides are horrible for drivers, we drive for over 30 minutes and make 2 or 3 stops just to make 10 bucked total.
On rider pays 6.50 and other pays 3.00 for over 15 miles and 30 min and with booking fees and your 25% you make almost the same as the driver and you didn't pay any gas. Not a fare deal for the driver.
